name: Addicting Chip Dip
author: Lindibakes
summary: Otherwise known as 'Goop,' this chip dip is the most delectable dip you'll ever taste! It was created by my late aunt.  Folks can't seem to get enough of it. Don't tell them the ingredients till they've tasted it! Serve with potato chips, pretzels or your favorite vegetables. They'll be licking the bowl!  Note: you can add more or less of the anchovy paste and onion to suit your tastes.  If you like a thinner dip, add a little more milk.
directions: In a medium-sized mixing bowl, combine cream cheese and milk until creamy
Add more milk for a thinner dip
Using a fork, whip the anchovy paste, onion, and garlic powder into the mixture
Cover and refrigerate this dip at least one hour before serving
